page.title: 12CROPS AND ANIMALS
page.content: The area under cultivation is mostly grassland,some of which is mown for hay,but the majority is used for grazing.There is some dairying taking place but a large percentage of the animals are store beasts. These animals are housed during the winter months in the small number of buildings present.There are also a few sheep in the fields.A few acres of barley are grown also potatoes. Much of the land is woodland, mostly conifers, which are felled on reaching maturity. There are a few stands of indigenous trees, deciduous varieties such as oak, beech, etc. A small proportion of the land is used as caravan sites.
